subject: where there has abstract method in interface
msgSnippet: Hi all. When I see the junit source code.I see about this: public interface Test { public abstract int countTestCases(); public abstract void run(TestResult
messageBody:
Hi all.
When I see the junit source code.I see about this:

public interface Test {
public abstract int countTestCases();
public abstract void run(TestResult result);
}

I know that abstract method used in abstract class.But why
it exist in interface.
